name: Sorry, We Have a Policy
description:
Sorry, We Have a Policy is a short and unhappy experience about trying to get trans healthcare.

CW: transphobia, with references to ableism, racism, and suicide.

Keep your place in the queue and try make it to the front. Maybe ignore the news and distract yourself with puzzles? Hope this time you aren't rejected again. And try not to think about all the bodies.

Developed for Trans Gal Jam 2022 ❤️

Features
  • Unhelpful Staff. Have your issues ignored and get misgendered.
  • Tedious Queue. Try not to lose your place. Yes, dying counts.
  • Useless Distractions. Keeps your eyes off the queue, doesn't help.

Use WASD and Arrow Keys to move, use Spacebar to talk.
